thread.title: D’oh! Ben Shapiro uses Chris Evans’ own tweet about Sessions against him, and it’s GLORIOUS
thread.title_full: D’oh! Ben Shapiro uses Chris Evans’ own tweet about Sessions against him, and it’s GLORIOUS

author: Sam J.
title: D’oh! Ben Shapiro uses Chris Evans’ own tweet about Sessions against him, and it’s GLORIOUS
text:
D’oh! Ben Shapiro uses Chris Evans’ own tweet about Sessions against him, and it’s GLORIOUS Posted at 11:53 am on February 13, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Not quite a week ago, Chris Evans (the guy who plays Captain America) FREAKED out on Twitter because David Duke (yes, that David Duke) thought Jeff Sessions was the right person for AG: If David Duke….DAVID!…DUKE!… thinks you're right, then you are unequivocally wrong. The confirmation of @jeffsessions is beyond words. https://t.co/CuLUznwO6S 
— Chris Evans (@ChrisEvans) February 9, 2017 
CAPS! AND … ELLIPSES … AND EXCLAMATION POINTS! OH MY! Trending   
Wow, not David Duke. THE David Duke. The horror! 
Well, as Twitchy readers know, David Duke has also all but endorsed Keith Ellison for Chairman of the DNC. Duke even said that he REALLY liked Ellison, it wasn’t just a passing thing. 
Hrm, so what does that say about Ellison? Quick, say the same thing about Keith Ellison for DNC Chair. https://t.co/ksjipzjemC 
— Ben Shapiro (@benshapiro) February 13, 2017 
Better yet, what does that say about Evans? 
LOL. 
Instantly after Shapiro pointed out Evans’ silly logic all sorts of Lefties were moaning and groaning that “it’s not the same thing,” which means it was. 
Like we said, GLORIOUS.
